attributes.action: Officially and without reserve state that Nelson Mandela was a terrorist and was involved in terrorist activities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The rules and definitions adopted by the British government to define when someone is a terrorist, or has committed acts of terrorism should be applied to Nelson Mandela, and a statement made by the government listing Nelson Mandela as having been a terrorist and having engaged in acts of terrorism.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
